name: Keep Your Eyes Closed
description:
This game was developed for Global Game Jam 2016.

This game has no graphics at all, you are guided only by sounds. You may need to go in the direction of a sound or dodge sounds coming at you.

Use the WASD keys and arrows to move, and the mouse to rotate, you may also have to click or press spacebar sometimes, but that's for you to discover!

Enjoy!
